title: Prices and Fees - Spanish Classes in Houston Spanish Perfecto
text: Spanish Classes Prices and Fees How much does it cost? We have several options for you. From private in-person classes, small groups, immersion classes, conversation classes and much more. Private in-person / Online Small Groups Semi private 2 or more people From 50 hours $45/hr 3-5 People 50 hrs $35/hr 2 hrs Classes Twice a week Clubs: Conversation / Latin Dance / Music and Spanish / Cinema / Drama / Reading Remember, you do not buy just teaching hours. You buy our Spanish support and mentoring in and out of classes. Plus, all of our packages include cultural and conversational practices as well as assessments. *Spanish Perfecto requires 100% payment upon agreement approval. - Sales tax Included - We come to you (with a minimum charge of $10 per trip) $0.70/mile - Textbook and Workbook Not included Got a Question?
